title: Update: The Dating Question You Need To Ask Your Partner!
description:
If you’re starting to get serious with someone right now, there’s one question you need to ask.
A while ago, Cassie, our executive vice president, I gave us all the questions you should be asking all your matches on Tinder, Hinge, and Bumble.
Now, Cassie shares with us the follow-up question for when things are getting
more serious.
This question would work for couples in relationships/married too:
What’s the one thing a partner needs to know about you in order for you to be happy?
For Kristin, someone would need to know that she needs validation. "I struggle with that, so I need words of affirmation and validation from my partner." 
Bert loves being in a committed relationship but also needs to feel independent.
Moe needs his peace, and Cassie needed to be respected as an equal.
If that question is a bit too intense for you then ask:
What's the one thing your best friend would tell someone you're dating about you?
The Bert Show answers that question and for homework, their friends have to answer!
